Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: We have tables Orders Order Lines Delivery Invoice Payments and optionally Products and Resources We should integrate to produce events First identify possible activities Order Created from Orders Items Picked from Order Lines Order Dispatched and Order Arrived from Delivery Invoice Issued from Invoice Payment Received from Payments

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Identify possible activities Order Created from Orders table Items Picked from Order Lines Order Dispatched and Order Arrived from Delivery Invoice Issued from Invoice Payment Received from Payments

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: For Items Picked each line has item picking date and picker id Should we create one event per item picking Probably yes because each picking is a distinct activity timestamps differ even within same order so separate events Activity Item Picked

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: For Order Created timestamp order date resource sales person id For Item Picked timestamp item picking date resource picker id For Order Dispatched timestamp delivery dispatch date resource carrier id For Order Arrived timestamp delivery arrival date resource carrier id For Invoice Issued timestamp invoice issue date resource billing person id For Payment Received timestamp payment date resource System

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: Simplify include Resource column with mapped names from Resources table Include case attributes customer id customer type order priority sales person for all events Include event specific attributes like item id quantity delivery id delivery note invoice id invoice amount payment id payment method payment reference

Name: Validation - PE
Text: List all events with timestamps Orders 5 events Order Lines 9 events Delivery 5 records two events each 10 events Invoice 5 events Payments 5 events total 34 events Check chronological order per case verify for order 1001 1002 1003 1004 1005 timelines good

Name: Backtracking - IND
Text: For order 1004 has picking but no delivery no invoice Note missing data handle incomplete cases in process mining
